I m really seeing a trend of these visually beautiful movies that have absolutely no story underneath. This is the prime example of a movie that was made to cash in from the success of the first one But it s just struggling to find anything to do. The story is random There is really nothing interesting about the time travel storyline that is done to death in other movies. The film makers try to mask that with visual spectacle But it is still fairly obvious. Despite the glamorous look it s just incredibly forgettable.
